com.percussion.pso.utils
Class PSOExtensionParamsHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.pso.utils.PSOExtensionParamsHelper

public class PSOExtensionParamsHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Helps make getting Extension/Result parameters easier by doing the necessary conversion and error handling.

Author:
adamgent
See Also:

                                java.lang.Object[] params,
                                com.percussion.server.IPSRequestContext request,
                                org.apache.commons.logging.Log log)
Constructor

Parameters:
def - The extension definition, never null.
params - The parameters passed to the extension, never null.
request - The request passed to the extension, maybe null if the extension does not handle requests (UDFs).
log - The logger to use for reporting errors and debug messages, maybe null. If null the logger for this class will be used.

Method Detail

getParameter

public java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String paramName)
Gets a parameter by first trying to get it from the request then followed by the parameters passed to the extension.

Parameters:
paramName -
Returns:
The value of the parameter, or null if the parameter is not found.

getRequiredParameter

public java.lang.String getRequiredParameter(java.lang.String paramName)
Gets a parameter and if its null or an empty String then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

Parameters:
paramName - Name of the parameter.
Returns:
value of the parameter never null or empty.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

getOptionalParameter

public java.lang.String getOptionalParameter(java.lang.String paramName,
                                             java.lang.String defaultValue)
Gets a parameter and if its null or empty returns the provided default value.

Parameters:
paramName - Name of the parameter.
defaultValue - The value to return if paramName is not found. Maybe null.
Returns:
The value of the parameter or the defaultValue.

getExtensionParameters

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getExtensionParameters()
Get the parameters passed to the extension as a map. This does not include the parameters that are in the request.

Returns:
a map with the parameter name as key and the parameter value as String object, never null, may be empty. Parameter values may be null.
